title: 500 - How Did Monkeypox Become a Public Health Crisis?
itunes:title: 500 - How Did Monkeypox Become a Public Health Crisis?
description: In the 500th episode of the Public Health on Call podcast, Dr. Chris Beyrer joins Dr. Josh Sharfstein to talk about how yet another virus has escalated to crisis levels in a short period of time. They discuss parallels and differences with the early days of the HIV epidemic, the danger of ignoring health challenges facing the developing world, and the future of public health challenges facing societies worldwide.
